sensor-on, sensor
toggle-on, toggle-off
siren-on, siren
lightbulb-on, lightbulb
bell-on, bell
light-switch-on, light-switch-off
garage-open, garage
door-open, door-closed
window-frame-open, window-frame
blinds, blinds-raised
eye, eye-blink
lock-open-alt, lock-alt
unlock-alt, unlock
rocket-launch, rocket
